desc: Global Communication is the only authorized distributor of Plantronics (Poly) headsets representing their full product range in Egypt since 1992. Following the acquisition of Polycom by Plantronics in 2019 we expanded our business to supplying audio video conferencing equipment from Polycom (Poly) & Logitech.
